post:
We have made every attempt to make our new Windows VPS line as affordable as possible. If you need a Windows VPS, look no further for a better price.


These Virtual Private Servers are created using Xen HVM technology and managed using SolusVM.


As with our Linux VPS line, you will find many nice features:

* Free Off-Site Backups
* Start, Stop, and Restart VPS
* Monitor Bandwidth
* VNC directy from web console
* Powered by SingleHop Servers



Link: http://swarmhost.net/vps-windows.php

Free Setup Code: WHT0913


Windows VPS 1

VPS Software: SolusVM / Xen HVM
CPU: 800MHZ Guaranteed
Memory: 512MB Guaranteed
Disk Space: 25GB
Bandwidth: 500GB/Month
IP Addresses: 1
OS: Windows Web Server 2008
$9.99/Setup $29.99/Month
